languages.text: "Эээ... кхм... да, конечно, Ваша Светлость. Обязательно назовем! Это огромная честь!" {n}Женщина натянуто улыбается. Затем добавляет куда искреннее:{/n} "...И спасибо — и за спасение Джаспера, и за то, что рассказали мне!"

"Ah... uh... yes, of course, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We will! It is a great honour!" {n}She forces a smile. Then, with far greater sincerity, she adds,{/n} "And thank you — both for saving Jaspar and for letting me know he's all right!"
languages.original_text: "Эээ... кхм... да, конечно, Ваша Светлость. Обязательно назовем! Это огромная честь!" {n}Женщина натянуто улыбается. Затем добавляет куда искреннее:{/n} "...И спасибо — и за спасение Джаспера, и за то, что рассказали мне!"

traits.locale_text: "Ah... uh... yes, of course, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We will! It is a great honour!" {n}She forces a smile. Then she adds with far greater sincerity,{/n} "And thank you — both for saving Jaspar and for telling me!"

"Ah... uh... yes, of course, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We will! It is a great honour!" {n}She forces a smile. Then she adds with far greater sincerity,{/n} "And thank you — both for saving Jaspar and for telling me!"

"Ah... uh... yes, of course, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We will! It is a great honour!" {n}She forces a smile. Then, with far greater sincerity, she adds,{/n} "And thank you — both for saving Jaspar and for letting me know he's ok!"

"Ah... uh... yes, of course, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We will! It is a great honour!" {n}She forces a smile. Then, with far greater sincerity, she adds,{/n} "And thank you — both for saving Jaspar and for letting me know he's all right!"

"Ah... uh... yes, of course, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We will! It is a great honour!" {n}She forces a smile. Then, with far greater sincerity, she adds,{/n} "And thank you — both for saving Jaspar and for letting me know he's all right!"

"Ah... uh... yes, of course, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We will! It is a great honour!" {n}She forces a smile. Then, with far greater sincerity, she adds,{/n} "And thank you — both for saving Jaspar and for letting me know he's all right!"

languages.text: «Ah... eh... sí, por supuesto, {mf|milord|milady}. ¡Cuente con ello! ¡Es un gran honor!». {n}Esboza una sonrisa forzada. A continuación, mostrando una sinceridad mucho mayor, añade,{/n} «¡Y gracias, tanto por salvar a Jaspar como por informarme de que está bien!».
languages.original_text: "Ah... uh... yes, of course, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We will! It is a great honour!" {n}She forces a smile. Then, with far greater sincerity, she adds,{/n} "And thank you — both for saving Jaspar and for letting me know he's all right!"

traits.locale_text: «Ah... eh... sí, por supuesto, {mf|milord|milady}. ¡Cuente con ello! ¡Es un gran honor!». {n}Esboza una sonrisa forzada. A continuación, mostrando una sinceridad mucho mayor, añade,{/n} «¡Y gracias, tanto por salvar a Jaspar como por informarme de que está bien!».

languages.text: "Ah ... äh ... ja, selbstverständlich, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Das werden wir! Es ist eine große Ehre!" {n}Sie lächelt gezwungen. Dann, mit sehr viel mehr Ehrlichkeit, fügt sie hinzu:{/n} "Und danke — dass Ihr Jaspar gerettet habt und dass Ihr mir gesagt habt, dass er wohlauf ist!"
languages.original_text: "Ah... uh... yes, of course, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We will! It is a great honour!" {n}She forces a smile. Then, with far greater sincerity, she adds,{/n} "And thank you — both for saving Jaspar and for letting me know he's all right!"

traits.locale_text: "Ah ... äh ... ja, selbstverständlich, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Das werden wir! Es ist eine große Ehre!" {n}Sie lächelt gezwungen. Dann, mit sehr viel mehr Ehrlichkeit, fügt sie hinzu:{/n} "Und danke — dass Ihr Jaspar gerettet habt und dass Ihr mir gesagt habt, dass er wohlauf ist!"

languages.text: « Ah... Euh... Oui, bien sûr, Votre Seigneurie. C'est promis ! Ce sera un grand honneur ! » {n}Elle se force à sourire, avant d'ajouter avec bien plus de sincérité :{/n} « Et merci... d'avoir sauvé Jaspar et de m'avoir rassurée sur son sort ! »
languages.original_text: "Ah... uh... yes, of course, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We will! It is a great honour!" {n}She forces a smile. Then, with far greater sincerity, she adds,{/n} "And thank you — both for saving Jaspar and for letting me know he's all right!"

traits.locale_text: « Ah... Euh... Oui, bien sûr, Votre Seigneurie. C'est promis ! Ce sera un grand honneur ! » {n}Elle se force à sourire, avant d'ajouter avec bien plus de sincérité :{/n} « Et merci... d'avoir sauvé Jaspar et de m'avoir rassurée sur son sort ! »

languages.text: “啊……呃……好的，没问题，大人。我们会的！荣幸至极！”{n}她努力地挤出了个笑容，随后更加诚挚地补充了一句。{/n}“谢谢您，谢谢您救了贾斯帕，谢谢您告诉我他没事！”
languages.original_text: "Ah... uh... yes, of course, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We will! It is a great honour!" {n}She forces a smile. Then, with far greater sincerity, she adds,{/n} "And thank you — both for saving Jaspar and for letting me know he's all right!"

traits.locale_text: “啊……呃……好的，没问题，大人。我们会的！荣幸至极！”{n}她努力地挤出了个笑容，随后更加诚挚地补充了一句。{/n}“谢谢您，谢谢您救了贾斯帕，谢谢您告诉我他没事。”

languages.text: 「あの…えっと…はい、もちろんです、陛下。そういたします！とても光栄です！」{n}彼女は無理やり笑顔を作る。そして、より真摯な気持ちでこう付け加えた。{/n}「そして感謝いたします。ジャスパーを助けていただいたうえ、あの人の無事まで知らせていただいて！」
languages.original_text: "Ah... uh... yes, of course, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We will! It is a great honour!" {n}She forces a smile. Then, with far greater sincerity, she adds,{/n} "And thank you — both for saving Jaspar and for letting me know he's all right!"

traits.locale_text: 「あの…えっと…えぇ、もちろんです、陛下。そうしますとも！とても光栄です！」{n}彼女は無理やり笑顔を作る。そして、心からまっすぐと出た言葉で付け加える。{/n}「あとは、ジャスパーを助けてくれて、あの人の無事を知らせてくれて、ありがとうございます！」
「あの…えっと…はい、もちろんです、陛下。そういたします！とても光栄です！」{n}彼女は無理やり笑顔を作る。そして、より真摯な気持ちでこう付け加えた。{/n}「そして感謝いたします。ジャスパーを助けていただいたうえ、あの人の無事まで知らせていただいて！」

languages.text: "Aa, şey... Tabii {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, elbette veririz! Bizim için büyük şeref!" {n}Zoraki gülümsüyor. Sonra çok daha içten bir ifadeyle ekliyor.{/n} "Ayrıca hem Jaspar'ı kurtardığınız hem de iyi olduğunu haber verdiğiniz için çok teşekkürler!"
languages.original_text: "Ah... uh... yes, of course, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We will! It is a great honour!" {n}She forces a smile. Then, with far greater sincerity, she adds,{/n} "And thank you — both for saving Jaspar and for letting me know he's all right!"

traits.locale_text: "Aa, şey... Tabii {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, elbette veririz! Bizim için büyük şeref!" {n}Zoraki gülümsüyor. Sonra çok daha içten bir ifadeyle ekliyor:{/n} "Ayrıca hem Jaspar'ı kurtardığınız hem de iyi olduğunu haber verdiğiniz için çok teşekkürler!"
